Forge

The construction vertical of CogNexus.io, designed to bring clarity and confidence to construction teams.

Core Capabilities

Spec & Drawing Q&A

Get answers grounded in source documents with full citation and provenance tracking.

Meeting Agents

Record, summarize, and distribute meeting notes automatically with action item tracking.

T&M Tracking

Track labor, materials, and expenses with photo validation and real-time reporting.

Pull Planning & Forecasting

Align trades and prevent delays with AI-powered schedule optimization.

Lessons Learned Repository

Carry knowledge forward to future projects with searchable insights database.
